<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Pathfinder's Mentor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2399)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 196 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +15; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) and two other common languages)

**Skills** [Pathfinder Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +15, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

**Int** +3, **Wis** +3, **Cha** +1

**Will** +14 

</column>

---        

A _Pathfinder’s mentor_ is a [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3117) that has developed sapience. It has two aeon stone slots, and both stones grant their resonant powers without interfering with each other. If both slots are filled, the wayfinder and two stones count as two items toward your investiture limit. Most _Pathfinder’s mentors_ are eager explorers that object to staying in one location for long, urging their bearers toward ancient ruins to explore, relics to study, and discoveries to make. To this end, the _wayfinder_ acts as a guide, making [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) checks on your behalf during your travels. A Pathfinder’s mentor also has the following activations.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** The _wayfinder_ casts [_know the way_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1582) on you.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _wayfinder_ casts [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368) on you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
